FCAU PARISThe board of Renault SA RNO 428 said the French auto maker needs more time to weigh a merger proposal from Fiat Chrysler Automobiles FCAU 320 NV a deal that would create the worlds thirdlargest auto maker by production with a market value of about 40 billionRenaults board said Tuesday it has decided to continue to study with interest the opportunity of such a combination and to extend the discussions on this subject adding that it would meet again on Wednesday evening

Trucks print money for these companies and FCAU is taking market share from GM by the literal truckload If you look at first quarter results this will be shown Ram trucks out sold Chevy trucks for the first time ever in a quarter And with May results coming in for Ram trucks at an alltime high 67k the probability of Ram trucks overtaking and outselling both of GMS truck brands is becoming a matter of when not if At this rate it could happen this year
